channel.title: Custom Mini Quest Help [PI]
channel.description: Hey so I'm making a mini quest type thing. The story is this guy Hengrad lost his uncle's demon statues and he sends you out to find them. You kill these monsters that drop them. Then when you have them I want Hengrad to say something like "Oh I can never thank you enough for finding the statues!" but if you don't have all 5 in your inventory then he says something like "Have you found the statues yet?" I think it would be in action handler but I'm not sure.. If you have Skype and you want to discuss it over that then feel free to add me. Grant.madison4

item.title: Custom Mini Quest Help [PI]

I added all the dialogues and when I have the items in the inventory the npc just starts from the first dialogue.

item.title: Custom Mini Quest Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @I_Grant_I I Grant I
item.description:
@I_Grant_I wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:2, topic:510175”]Add an if statement when talking to him

if (!playerHasItem(ITEM,5)) { //.. error } else { //do this } [/quote]

Gyazo

Gyazo

​

Compiler Error… ^^^

Here is the case.

case 808: if (!playerHasItems(15584,15585,15586,15587,15588,15589)) { sendNpcChat2("Oh I cannot thank you enough!","Here take this as a reward!",c.talkingNpc, "Hengrad"); c.getItems().addItem(15590, 1); c.getItems().addItem(995, 10000000); } else { sendStatement("Have you found all 6 statues yet?"); } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Mini Quest Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @I_Grant_I I Grant I
item.description:
@I_Grant_I wrote:

Hey so I’m making a mini quest type thing. The story is this guy Hengrad lost his uncle’s demon statues and he sends you out to find them. You kill these monsters that drop them. Then when you have them I want Hengrad to say something like “Oh I can never thank you enough for finding the statues!” but if you don’t have all 5 in your inventory then he says something like “Have you found the statues yet?” I think it would be in action handler but I’m not sure… If you have Skype and you want to discuss it over that then feel free to add me. Grant.madison4

Read full topic
